skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer C Bache, Hull Number DD-470.
skins.selfIntroduction: Ahah! I'm the numero uno coolest Fletcher-class destroyer, Bache! My fire support in the Surigao Strait was no big deal! Also, no other destroyer has experienced the glory of resting beside the Colossus of Rhodes as much as I have! Hahahahah!
skins.acquisition: Yoohoo~! You the Commander? You look kinda weaksauce, though~! Name's Bache! I'm joining this fleet, starting today! I'll take good care of you, so just kick back and get ready for my greatness!
skins.login: Drink this energizing coffee! We can't have you run outta gas, can we!
skins.details: Hah hah hah! Is it my time to sortie?
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's windy as all hell today... and when it gets too windy, bad things happen. You get me, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: This outfit is what's in vogue! Do you seriously not know fashion when you see it?
skins.secretaryIdle3: If the other Fletchers were as flashy as me then maybe I could actually remember their names!
skins.secretaryTouch: Don't come begging for my help later if you're this easily distracted and can't finish your work!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You really like my getup, don'tcha, Commander? You absolute degenerate~
skins.secretaryHeadpat: You might be weaksauce, but you're really good at patting heads!

skins.shipDescription: Ahaha~! Are you seeing this, Commander? This sturdiness, this gorgeous paint job, and these special accessories hand-picked by yours truly! Muahaha! I am the true speed-star of this port!
skins.acquisition: Ahaha~! Are you seeing this, Commander? This sturdiness, this gorgeous paint job, and these special accessories hand-picked by yours truly! Muahaha! I am the true speed-star of this port!
skins.login: Hmm? Hmmmmmm? Man, you look miserable, Commander! Sit here and I'll take you on a wild ride! Ahahahaha!
skins.details: When it comes to bikes... I don't know squat! So I just got my Royal Navy pal to help out! I've gotta thank her later!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Still looking brand new? Well yeah, thanks to my daily pro-level maintenance!
skins.secretaryIdle2: You wanna ride my bike? Of course you... can't! Think what'd happen if you crash it!
skins.secretaryIdle3: If there's somewhere you wanna go, if you ask me really nicely with a cherry on top, I just might let you hop on~
skins.secretaryTouch: Aha! You're digging my bike and style, aren't you, Commander? Aren't you jelly? Since I'm so nice, I'll let you stare until you're satisfied!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Seizing the chance to feel me up, huh~? You dirty perv~

skins.shipDescription: Tada! Your favorite tennis superstar, Bache, is right here! ...Hey Commander, you're supposed to cheer for me like you're one of my fans in the stands!
skins.acquisition: Tada! Your favorite tennis superstar, Bache, is right here! ...Hey Commander, you're supposed to cheer for me like you're one of my fans in the stands!
skins.login: Commander, come here and help me practice! If I win the championship, you'll get a special reward?
skins.details: I've gotta come up with a sweet victory pose... It doesn't concern weaksauce like you, but you can brainstorm with me if you want!
skins.secretaryIdle1: They said I'm a wild card... Does that mean I'm super talented?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hey! Wait a sec! You're throwing too fast for me to return the ball...!
skins.secretaryIdle3: You tired, Commander? Guess what, I anticipated that you would be~! Heheh, have a taste of my deluxe honey drink! This stuff will get you back in the game, no matter how drained you are!
skins.secretaryTouch: Has my tennis outfit got you crazy for me~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: No weaksauce commander in the world can touch me now~! Whuah?!
